website_summaries.verdict: An innovative option for those who want a rechargeable waterproof lighter that does not require butane.
pros: Uses state-of-the-art technology to create a plasma wave that is hotter than fire
Rechargeable battery provides more than three hours of use on a single charge
Intended for use in rain or shine
cons: Lid does not open very far

website_summaries.verdict: This reliable yet stylish lighter slips easily into your pocket. Dual plasma beams get the job done in all weather conditions.
pros: This futuristic-looking lighter is sleek and compact
The rechargeable lithium-ion battery eliminates the need for butane
Built to last and relatively inexpensive
cons: Despite company’s airport-approved claim, some users have reported TSA seizing their lighters

website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight electric lighter that substitutes butane with state-of-the-art plasma technology.
pros: Uses a lithium ion cell to create consistent heat
Lighter is airport-approved, windproof and splashproof
Requires only about 1 hour to recharge the lighter
Lighter is both butane-free and chemical-free
Sold with a one-year manufacturer's warranty
cons: Does not hold a charge as well as comparable electric lighters
May overheat when you charge the lighter

customer_reviews.text: Order the set of two lighters. Nice, small, easy to use. My concern is safety in that there is no off switch, you can hear the slight buzzing sound of the lighter operating even with the lid closed. This could be a major safety problem if you have it in your pocket or in a drawer (where it will spend most of the time, nonsmoker here) and something presses against the power button. Although I will keep them I purchased another model with both a on\off switch in the base and will not operate with the cover closed.
